title: Oburus Momus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Asian, Bakery, Catering, Middle Eastern
description: A small vegetarian restaurant offering international food with changing menu, which always includes vegan options. Menu consists of both healthy options and snacks to accompany wine and beer. Located on the way to Ancient Theater. As of May 2016, the only vegetarian restaurant in town.
